comments.body: A comment may be helpful to mention that because of the `minOneMessage` behavior, we may need to grow the buffer to ensure progress can be made.
Good point, I've added a comment. Let me know if you think it needs to be improved

              val sizeInBytes = fileRecords.sizeInBytes
              val bytesNeeded = Math.max(config.loadBufferSize, sizeInBytes)
